prompt: DIY pirate radio studio inside a glass sunroom at night: window grid framing an amber horizon; turntable, mixer, cassette deck on a desk; a mic arm; an ON AIR light; milk crate with vinyl; distant rooftop antenna outside. A gold sun-insignia sticker glows on the mixer.
creator: jh
